snippet: The state Supreme Court will censure Judge G. Todd Baugh and suspend him without pay for 31 days for saying a 14-year-old rape victim was “older than her chronological age.”
abstract: Montana Supreme Court will censure Judge G Todd Baugh and suspend him without pay for 31 days for saying a 14-year-old rape victim who later committed suicide was 'older than her chronological age.'
lead_paragraph: The state Supreme Court will censure Judge G. Todd Baugh and suspend him without pay for 31 days for saying a 14-year-old rape victim was “older than her chronological age.”

headline.main: Montana: Judge Faces Censure for Comments on Young Rape Victim
headline.print_headline: Montana: Judge Faces Censure for Comments on Young Rape Victim
